tswitem.name: Solid Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Solid Augment Resonator
An unattuned survivability augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will give you a beneficial effect that increases your block rating by 25/ 50/ 75/ 100/ 125 for 5 seconds whenever you activate this ability.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 2 Attuned Robust Augment Resonators
  • 24 Pure earth runes
  • 36 Pure water
